channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Equator closes $55M fund to bring more private capital to African climate tech
item.description: African VC firm Equator has raised $55M for its first fund, which will back early-stage climate tech startups on the continent. © 2024 TechCrunch. All...

item.title: What's Really Happening With Elon Musk and Those ‘Stranded’ Astronauts?
item.description: Two NASA officials have weighed in on the public dispute over when and how to bring home Butch Wilmore and Suni Williams, who have been on the Interna...

item.title: Can Gaming Save the Apple Vision Pro?
item.description: A new patent could suggest that Apple may be ready to take VR gaming more seriously on the Apple Vision Pro—which is exactly what's needed to turn the...

item.title: Mississippi Passes Bill Banning Lab-Grown Meat
item.description: Three states have now passed legislation making it illegal to manufacture, sell, or distribute cultivated meat.

item.title: Apple’s next major OS updates will bring the biggest design overhaul in years
item.description: Apple’s next set of major updates for the iPhone, iPad and Mac operating systems could bring the biggest design changes across the company’s platforms...

item.title: OPM Watchdog Says Review of DOGE Work Is Underway

item.title: Startup studio Hexa acquires majority stake in Veevart, a vertical SaaS platform for museums

item.title: Meet the new VC firm secretly backed by Volkswagen
item.description: A new venture firm called Leitmotif has been on a quiet blitz for the last 16 months, funding around 20 startups broadly focused on decarbonization. I...

item.title: The Worst 7 Years in Boeing’s History—and the Man Who Won’t Stop Fighting for Answers
item.description: Fatal crashes. A door blowout. Grounded planes. Inside the citizen-led, obsessive campaign to hold Boeing accountable and prevent the next disaster.

item.title: Reshape Energy is using an acquisition playbook to drive energy upgrades for commercial real estate
